review.title: “Great learning opportunity”
review.pros: Pros – Learn much about video editing and media production. Also, hands on experience with video camera's during live sporting events.
review.cons: Cons – Hours are limited and very competitive, restrained by the amount of sporting events throughout the year.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Allow for a two or three day learning session where employees can gain hands on experience before they are thrown into an event. When I was employed, I had prior experience. Although, others did not, which took them time to adapt to things.
